1stexample.cpp

This is a minimal example of how to use the CStconfig class.

#include "../include/CStconfig.h"
#include <iostream>


//*********************************************************************
//  minimal example
int main(int argc, char* argv[])
{
  const double degree = 3.1415926535898/180;
    
  MConf::CStconfig mc;

  if(false==mc.load("w7x-sc1(reduced).bc")) {
    std::cout << "Loading error\n";
    return 1;
  }

  mc.truncate(1e-6);           // truncate spectrum
  mc.setAccuracy(1e-4);        // set accuracy of coordinate transformation
  mc.setB0(2.5,36*degree);     // set value of B on magn. axis at 36degree

  MConf::Vector3d cyl(6,1*degree,0.5);// R=6,fi=1deg,Z=0.5
  double s = mc.cyl2s(cyl);    // s is the norm. toroidal flux

  std::cout<<"cyl="<<cyl<<"\ns="<<s<<std::endl;
  return 0;
}
